description: Creates a history of assets and their last location and provides it as a location history dashboard stream. This component requires input messages with the following properties set: id, label, long, lat, timestamp, speed (optional).

properties.name: historyname
properties.label: History Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this history to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: apikey
properties.label: Google Maps API Key
properties.description: Provide the API key for Google Maps.

properties.name: inactivitytimeout
properties.label: Inactivity Timeout Hours
properties.description: Number of hours of inactivity after when an asset is removed.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.
